name: 1980 (franbeb)
description:
Synth wave survival game

Collect coins to be able to shoot

Shoot police cars to gain points

Try to get the highest score

Controls:

Move with WASD or keys

Shoot with Space Bar

Slide with shift

Mute with M

Credits:

Music by Mamba Suite -https://open.spotify.com/artist/034CCWMfVThmBT8b3xXarS

3D models by Kenney
